The fraction \[\dfrac1{99^2}=0.\overline{b_{n-1}b_{n-2}\ldots b_2b_1b_0},\] where $n$ is the length of the period of the repeating decimal expansion.  What is the sum $b_0+b_1+\cdots+b_{n-1}$?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A) }874\qquad
\textbf{(B) }883\qquad
\textbf{(C) }887\qquad
\textbf{(D) }891\qquad
\textbf{(E) }892\qquad$
